name: DEPRECATED: All cascading style sheet files should be in specific directory
description: To be compliant with code Conventions for the JavaServer Pages Technology, this rule checks if all cascading style sheet files are in the recommended location :  <context root> /css/
output: This report lists all style sheet files (X) located outside the "styles" directory in a JSP Application. It provides the following information: File full name, File directory
rationale: For maintainability aspects, file organization must be respected.
remediation: Change file location according to the recommended naming convention.
total: Number of CSS pages in a JSP Application
